say.name: GROCER:
say.says: Thanks for your help, I really appreciate it. If you decide you're looking for a job, let me know. I probably know better than anyone how hard it is to find work as an ex-con.

say.name: GROCER:
say.says: Sure. Anyways, Kate wanted to live in the city. Pretty sure she moved out of town right out of high school. That's pretty much all I know.
